summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL - THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 2500. THE CONTACT STATED THE AIR BAG WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF A MANUFACTURER'S RECALL RELATED TO THE FAILURE; HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF ISSUE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 100,000.
